picks.text: The core technology fee is considerably altered, especially for web distribution
picks.full-pick-text: The core technology fee is considerably altered, especially for web distribution
picks.notes: • MacRumors outlines CTF changes, but not especially for web distribution. But with Stephen away, and this being an exhibition game... hello half points!

picks.text: The language of "member in good standing" is removed
picks.full-pick-text: The language of "member in good standing" is removed

picks.text: The two "scare sheets" for linking to external websites for payment will become optional
picks.full-pick-text: The two "scare sheets" for linking to external websites for payment will become optional

picks.text: Phil Schiller is replaced as the head of the initiative
picks.full-pick-text: Phil Schiller is replaced as the head of the initiative

picks.text: The core technology fee is removed for fully free applications
picks.full-pick-text: The core technology fee is removed for fully free applications
picks.notes: • It was removed for developers with no revenue... another half point!

picks.text: Changes to rules about apps being installed from alternate sources
picks.full-pick-text: Changes to rules about apps being installed from alternate sources
picks.notes: • Specifically, that users no longer need to reinstall an application to get it from a different app marketplace.

relevant-episodes.title: Connected #498: He Sees You When You're Sleeping
